before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2svs2","text":"To reduce the risk of contaminating reagents we recommend making small aliquots of master mixes, primers and probes prior to use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3jvr0","text":"Thaw the master mix, primers, and probe on ice before use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4gigs","text":"Wipe down all pipettes and surfaces with 10% bleach.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdiff","text":"This protocol describes ddPCR titration of AAV vectors. To see the full abstract and additional resources, visit https://www.addgene.org/protocols/aav-ddpcr-titration/.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":113,"length":54}],"data":[]},{"key":"evfp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fps4g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8uh3g","text":"Sample Data: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9skfl","text":"When analyzing data there should be a clear distinction between negative droplets (black) and positive droplets (blue).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"253ld","text":"The no template control (NTC) should be close to zero (B08). At Addgene, runs with an NTC \u003e5 are invalid.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fqtif","text":"To reduce NTC values, we recommend wiping down all pipettes and equipment with 10% bleach prior to use and keeping all reagents and samples on ice or pre-chilled 96-well freezer blocks during use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d5fj4","text":"In this protocol, a dilution series is prepared for each AAV sample and the 3 final dilutions are assayed. The samples that are assayed are diluted 2-fold serially therefore, the concentration obtained by ddPCR should decrease by a factor of 2 across the dilutions. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bt66a","text":"In the example below, 2-fold serial dilutions of a sample were loaded in wells A04, A05 and A06. As shown in the image and table below, the concentration of positive droplets decreases by a factor of ~2.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cl027","text":"To increase the accuracy of the titer, calculate an average of several dilutions.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e1amj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9d2u7","text":"  ","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"d8qc7","text":"","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7mvru","text":"  ","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8hamb","text":"For additional tips on AAV titering using ddPCR, read our blog post.","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":68}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":68}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DC7CD96E73AC11EA94320242AC110004","url":"https://www.addgene.org/protocols/aav-ddpcr-titration"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"6F10582073AD11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","height":431,"id":189253,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"co6tb","text":"Figure 1: ddPCR sample _titration_table_AAV_ddPCR.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/public/5acd19e056bdf88808866a63dd76bebaf3bfacef4acb2f29cfb4ece3805005bf/b3927esn.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f24h7esn.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/f24g7esn.webp","width":580}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DE11935C741011EAA3150242AC110003","url":"https://blog.addgene.org/droplet-digital-pcr-for-aav-quantitation"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"7p1cc","text":"This protocol was modified from the publication Lock M, Alvira MR, Chen SJ, Wilson, 2014.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":40}],"data":[]},{"key":"906lu","text":"The dilution series outlined in this protocol is based on an AAV titer range of 5E+12 - 5E+13 GC/mL. Users may need to run lower or higher dilutions depending on their particular sample.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"F268F60473AC11EA94320242AC110004","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24328707"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6m8n2","text":"Before handling any viruses get materials ready.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bn3v0","text":"Ensure that primers, probe, 10X PCR buffer, and master mix are thawed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5jq1","text":"Vortex primers, probe and master mix for   then spin   in a mini centrifuge and place  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dchrf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"3BE4E8B073AF11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"79069","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"400630C073AF11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"79070","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4449F4F073AF11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"48353","label":"","temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36if1","text":"Wipe down a DG8 cartridge holder with bleach and place in the Biological Safety Cabinet (BSC).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"606f8","text":"Make sure that the BSC to be used for dilution and the BSC to be used for droplet generation are supplied with sufficient pipette tips and reagent reservoirs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"t4fe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bjnt9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"2mkpu","text":"*Pro-Tip*","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ovdp","text":"Prepare the viral dilution in a separate biological safety cabinet (dilution BSC) than that used for master mix preparation and droplet generation (droplet generation BSC).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7rv8a","text":"Pre-warm the 96-well plate sealer by gently touching the screen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ld0d","text":"Place a 48-well dilution plate in a chilled 96-well freezer block and place in the dilution BSC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"905uh","text":"Prepare 1X dilution buffer (see recipe in reagent section).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"23mfn","text":"Pour the 1X dilution buffer into a polystyrene reagent reservoir.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtr47","text":"Using a 20-200µl multichannel pipette, carefully add the dilution buffer to the dilution plate according to the dilution scheme listed in step 12.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8s6d","text":"Use a single channel 1-10µl pipette to add   of each viral sample to Dilution 1 in the 48-well dilution plate and pipette 5-10 times to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"euqi2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"722B1AC073AF11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87498","label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uj0i","text":"Dilute the virus as follows: Mix dilutions thoroughly, but pipette slowly to avoid generating aerosols. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jv5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"955nu","text":"Dilution 1 (20X):   in   1X PCR buffer (1:20) {"blocks":[{"key":"c6rfi","text":"Place an 8-well PCR tube strip into a chilled 96-well freezer block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bjb6","text":"Add   of the master mix to each PCR tube. Be careful to dispense to the bottom of the tube without collecting drops along the side of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"8uo05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","guid":"62F7D4A0740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87515","label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jcjv","text":"Cap gently - do not push the cap in all the way, just ensure the samples are covered.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a580h","text":"Bring the PCR tubes to the BSC used for dilutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3b2f1","text":"Without disturbing the liquid in the tube, gently uncap the PCR tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fsqf","text":"Add   of dilutions 6-8 to the appropriate PCR tubes. Pipette back and forth 5 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"133ek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"7492D1B0740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87516","label":"","unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"31go3","text":"Lightly cap the PCR tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1dnbf","text":"Bring the PCR tubes to the droplet generation BSC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4v3m2","text":"Without disturbing the liquid in the tube, gently uncap the tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72p9s","text":"Add   nuclease-free water to the NTC tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9o5lt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"8B8043D0740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87517","label":"","unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"68p7m","text":"Place a DG8 cartridge into the cartridge holder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1t160","text":"Using a 2-50µL multichannel pipet, load   of the reaction mixtures into the middle wells of the cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"eofu7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","guid":"91CA1130740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87518","label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ojei","text":"Add   of droplet generation oil to a polystyrene reagent reservoir.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"c5su8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"800","guid":"95F74020740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87519","label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94tmh","text":"Using the 20-200µL multichannel pipet, load   of droplet generation oil into the bottom row of wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a9ud7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"70","guid":"9A14DEB0740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87520","label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b02o8","text":"Cover the cartridge with the DG8 gasket, making sure that it is secure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avioi","text":"Transfer the cartridge holder to the droplet generator. Close the lid and wait for the droplets to be generated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6iorc","text":"Once the droplets have been generated, use a 20-200µL multichannel pipet to aspirate    of droplets. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4u3bm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9oj7c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"40","guid":"A4F17AA0740C11EAA230A96D3E3638CE","id":"87521","label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6tgpc","text":"*Pro-Tip* ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":121,"style":"bold"},{"length":1,"offset":121,"style":"sup"}],"key":"avv2n","text":"To ensure that the droplets are not disrupted insert the pipette tips directly in the center of the well and tilt to a 45o angle. Count to 20 while slowly and gently aspirating the droplets.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3muc","text":"Transfer the droplets to a prechilled PCR plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5l92u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cdr09","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"648no","text":"*Pro-Tip* ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":191,"style":"sup"}],"key":"eciut","text":"To ensure that the droplets are not disrupted insert the pipette tips and gently touch the bottom of the well. Lift the tips ~1mm. Touch the side of the well and tilt the pipette tips at a 45o angle. Count to 20 while slowly and gently dispensing the droplets down the side of the tube.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24coo","text":"Place a Pierceable Foil Heat Seal on the PCR plate with the red line facing up. If the plate sealer is not at temperature, touch the screen on the plate sealer to allow it to get to temperature. Once the temperature is reached, place the PCR plate with the foil onto the metal support block. Place the block in the plate sealer and press the ‘Seal’ button.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ecdm8","text":"After the plate has been sealed, proceed to thermocycling.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjkv2","text":"After PCR is complete, transfer the plate to the Droplet Reader.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eo1ou","text":"Open the QuantaSoft software to set up a new plate layout. Designate the sample name, experiment type, supermix type (ddPCR Supermix for Probes), the target names and target types.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8t8ak","text":"When the plate layout is complete, select 'Run' to begin the droplet reading.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16ehh","text":"When the droplet reading is complete, export the data from all wells as a CSV file which will be used to calculate the titer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ol6c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"23j4k","text":"T = {[(R*C)(1000/V)]*D}  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5an7d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"79u4a","text":"T = GC/mL R = reaction volume (20µL) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3409g","text":"C = Copies/µL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"35dj0","text":"V = volume of virus in reaction mix (4µL) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6rpce","text":"D = Dilution factor of virus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
